description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Board a derelict space station to salvage a lost alien artifact. Unknown dangers await you in this atmospheric first person shooter. Features LIVE multiplayer and singleplayer.
description.short: Board a derelict space station to salvage a lost alien artifact. Unknown dangers await you in this atmospheric first person shooter. Features LIVE multiplayer and singleplayer.
